body:
### About Me

I am Nic Galler, `ngaller`, `nicocrm`, `nico_g` or even `Chive` for those old enough to have met me on IRC in the 2000's.

### What I Do

I write programs and web sites.  I like to try a bit of everything but I am best with API integration and front-end logic.  I love C#, Javascript, PHP and also dabble with Ruby and Python from time to time.  I work mostly with InforCRM, Salesforce and Wordpress, using Angular, jQuery and dojo on the front-end.

### What A Geek!

I also enjoy gardening and cooking.  I love experimenting with recipes to find the right combination and know better than to follow a recipe to the letter (this is not unlike the way I program, come to think of it).  I make my own yogurt and sauerkraut (this may not help with the Geek factor).  I am an avid cyclist though a leg injury is keeping me from the bike right now.  When I am not doing any of that I am probably goofing around with my 2 1/2 year old son.
